name: Hauntsters
description: Hauntsters is a 2D battle game in which up to 4 players compete for victory in a spooky arena. Each player chooses their character from a selection of 12 supernatural entities, using their unique abilities and combos to win the fight. Compete in a chaotic free-for-all or team up with a friend for a combo-centric 2 v 2 team battle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or above Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 192 MB available space
